personal.firstNamePattern: First name should consist of letters: А-Я or A-Z
personal.firstNameMax: First name should have a maximum of 40 symbols
personal.lastNamePattern: Last name should consist of letters: А-Я or A-Z
personal.lastNameMax: Last name should have a maximum of 40 symbols
personal.emailPattern: Check your email please. Example: my-email@example.com
personal.phonePattern: Check your mobile phone number please. Example: +380999999999

address.placeName: Should consist of letters: А-Я or A-Z
address.country: The country name should contain no more than 60 characters
address.region: The name of the region should contain no more than 30 characters
address.city: The name of the settlement should contain no more than 30 characters
address.zip: Zip code should consist of 5 digits
address.deliveryData: Delivery details should contain no more than 256 characters

socialNetworks.uri: Example of link to your profile in the network: https://some-net/me-id-1234

password.minSymbols: Password length must be at least 8 characters
password.maxSymbols: Password length must not exceed 16 characters
password.samePassword: The new password should not match the current one!
password.newPasswordPattern: Password should include at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number

exists.phone: User with such phone already exists!
